Name: Battle Imagine - Golden Juggernaut
Description:
Activates or advances Golden Juggernaut's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Thunder Roar.

Arcane! Thunder Roar
Transform into Boss: Golden Juggernaut, granting yourself and 8 allies Shield. When dealing DMG, the shielded targets generate Thunderstrike (CD: 0.5s), and the DMG dealt depends on the friendly ATK.
(This effect cannot stack and only one will be effective.)
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
